mapper.sql: ID, UA, GROUP_ID, CHANNEL_ID, DEVICE_CODE, PROCESS_DATE, LAOWU_ID, DEVICE_PRS_DAY_NUM, DEVICE_UPD_DAY_NUM, PRS_ACTIVE_TOTAL_NUM, PRS_ACTIVE_VALID_NUM, PRS_ACTIVE_INVALID_NUM, PRS_INVALID_REPLACE_NUM, PRS_INVALID_UNINSTALL_NUM, MD5_KEY, VERSION
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_LOG_STAT.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
insert into
(
) values ( SEQ_LOG_STAT.nextval, #{ua,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{laowuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{devicePrsDayNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceUpdDayNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prsActiveTotalNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prsActiveValidNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prsActiveInvalidNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prsInvalidReplaceNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prsInvalidUninstallNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{md5Key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update:
update
VERSION = VERSION + 1,
DEVICE_PRS_DAY_NUM = #{devicePrsDayNum},
DEVICE_UPD_DAY_NUM = #{deviceUpdDayNum},
PRS_ACTIVE_TOTAL_NUM = #{prsActiveTotalNum},
PRS_ACTIVE_VALID_NUM = #{prsActiveValidNum},
PRS_ACTIVE_INVALID_NUM = #{prsActiveInvalidNum},
PRS_INVALID_REPLACE_NUM = #{prsInvalidReplaceNum},
PRS_INVALID_UNINSTALL_NUM = #{prsInvalidUninstallNum},
where ID = #{id} and VERSION = #{version}
